Coin Flip!


There are 3 games to choose from :

  • One Coin Flip

    • The game will randomly flip one coin.

  • Multiple Coin Flips

    • The game will flip multiple coins and display the output.

  • Guess the Result

    • The game will generate a random flip, and you have to guess the result of the flip
